name: 1(2) ENG FAIL FIXED
description: Engine is running at fixed power.

procedure.text:
Depending on the fixed power on the affected engine, be aware that large TQ split may develop with possible NR change.

If TQ split exceeds 30% 1 ENG DEGR or 2 ENG DEGR caution due to HANDLING will illuminate on the engine with higher TQ value.

- Continue flight monitoring engine parameters.
- Land as soon as practicable.
During descent with low power setting do NOT allow TQ on NOT affected engine to decrease below 10%.

procedure.heading: IF TQ on affected engine equal or lower than 50%:
procedure.text:
CAUTION: During landing consider low power available on affected engine.

After touchdown:
- Smoothly lower collective to MPOG maintaining NR within limits.
- If NR increases above limit, shutdown affected engine before lowering collective to MPOG.

procedure.heading: IF TQ on affected engine higher than 50%:
procedure.text:
CAUTION: If affected engine is above MCP shutdown engine within 5 min.
During engine shutdown be aware of possible NR droop and large TQ split.

Before approach for landing:
- Carry out ENGINE SHUTDOWN IN EMERGENCY procedure (see page 35).
- Refer to SINGLE ENGINE PROCEDURE (see page 217).
